channel.title: Stackable?
channel.description: hey, i just wanna know how do i make items stackable. like arrows or darts or SNOWballs lol anyway anyone help me please

item.title: Stackable?
item.dc:creator: @pwnage2u pwnage2u
item.description:
@pwnage2u wrote:

[quote=“Zombiedevice, post:4, topic:217834”][quote author=pwnage2u link=topic=286269.msg2317557#msg2317557 date=1215379126]

This will probably help alot.

You need to add it to item.java

Its actually easy lol. You need to add

itemStackable[itemid] = true;

under

itemTwoHanded[15333] = true;

i still dont get you?
[/quote]

Re read what he said. He explained basically the entire thing.[/quote]

public static boolean[] itemStackable = new boolean[20000];

i have this in my item.java but yea idk do i have to add something into item.java or item4.java or item.cfg

Read full topic
